Package mklab.JGNN.models.relational

Class RelationalGCN

java.lang.Object
mklab.JGNN.core.Model
mklab.JGNN.models.relational.RelationalGCN
public class RelationalGCN extends Model
Uses a GCNBuilder to construct a Graph Convolutional Network for unsupervised link prediction.
Author:
Emmanouil Krasanakis
